alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Nemaha; Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 2:58PM CDT until August 19 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FREMONT...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN NEMAHA AND OTOE COUNTIES... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Unadilla, or 20 miles east of Lincoln, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nebraska City, Syracuse, Peru, Johnson, Cook, Talmage, Dunbar, Brock, Julian, Lorton, Camp Catron and Duck Creek Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
